nodes.text: Fanha was a planet located in the Seitia sector of the Outer Rim.

The planet was the site of a battle of the Western Reaches Operation during the Imperial Reconquest of the Rim in 17 BBY. Imperial Admiral Screed and Shea Hublin smashed the Iska pirates at Fanha, forcing the pirate lord Guun Cutlax to flee into the Atravis sector.
